parameter.name: size
parameter.comment: this will be dynamically updated with the number of mpi client ranks

parameter.name: blocks
parameter.comment: this will be dynamically updated with the number of blocks specified on the command line of the executable

layout.name: one_int
layout.comment: This will provide storage for one integer per Damaris client rank

layout.name: one_double
layout.comment: This will provide storage for one double per Damaris client rank, but note, only rank 0 uses it in this example

variable.name: cube_i
variable.comment: This is our main data set being passed from the simulation C code to Python

variable.name: last_iter
variable.comment: set time-varying=true so the value can be updated on each iteration of the simulation from Python

variable.name: array_sum
variable.comment: used to pass summation computed on C side to the Python side
